dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5036 IH: To remove the limitation imposed as a result of receiving funding under the Land and Water Conservation Fund on the conversion of Northeast Sedgwick County Park in Sedgwick County, Kansas, to a use other than public outdoor recreation.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Estes introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To remove the limitation imposed as a result of receiving funding under the Land and Water Conservation Fund on the conversion of Northeast Sedgwick County Park in Sedgwick County, Kansas, to a use other than public outdoor recreation.

section.header: Nonapplication of limitation on conversion to use other than public outdoor recreation
section.text: Section 200305(f)(3) of title 54, United States Code, shall not apply to Northeast Sedgwick County Park in Sedgwick County, Kansas.
